text: Hi! I'm Jeff. I am a remote freelancer in Richmond, VA. I generally focus on b2b healthcare topics including primary care, social determinants, etc. Got here via <@U012P66GRQC>! Looking forward to interacting with this community!

! Looking forward to interacting with this community!

text:
Hey y'all, I'm Mike. Like seemingly everyone else nowadays, I'm a remote freelancer based out of Toronto. I'm actually from Mississauga, and now you know my Darkest Secret. I've been working in media and journalism for the last decade, both as an editorial-side writer/editor and in content marketing as a freelancer and as an in-house team lead for sites like HuffPost and Daily Hive.

I had to be able to write and pitch for any and all clients at those positions, so I can write and ideate about pretty much anything. My biggest comfort zones are tech, gaming, media, travel, food/drink, and anything to do with PR or branding. I'm used to working with clients to find the best, smartest, and most relevant ways to get their point across without coming off as corny or outdated. I also have a experience in writing and producing videos and podcasts!

I'm a pop culture addict and my Animal Crossing village has become a testament to man's hubris, so please hit me up if you want to chat about anything from grammar and strategy to your favourite season of Star Trek. I was sent a link by my brilliant friend Juliana. Nice to meet everyone!
